title: Emmerdale boss reveals the first details of Chas Dingle's exit | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Sunday 19 Feb 2017 7:00 am (Picture: ITV) 
Following Lucy Pargeter’s delightful news that she is expecting twins, Emmerdale bosses are lining up an emotional temporary departure for Chas Dingle – and fans needn’t worry that the show are going to try and pull the wool over their eyes over whether it could be permanent. 
In coming weeks, Chas will make her on screen departure as Lucy goes on maternity leave and show boss Iain MacLeod has revealed that her break will tie in with the character’s turbulent relationship with her mum, Faith. 
He explained to Metro.co.uk at a recent event: ‘Her exit story is tied in which Faith. Obviously, Chas is back in the not too distant future – the viewers know the off screen situation so if you create a big “Gasp, I wonder if she has left for good?”, it would be like: “Well, she hasn’t though, has she? She’s just gone on maternity leave.” 
‘We didn’t want to lead the audience up the garden path – it’s big and emotional with some of the funniest and most heartbreaking scenes between Faith and Chas in the run up to it which sum up their whole relationship but nobody dies or anything.’ All the press event gossip!
